message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $150. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $150 is a bit high. I'm willing to pay $120 for it.
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  I understand your perspective, but I can't go as low as $120. How about we meet in the middle at $135?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $135 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $125 for the product.
